body.description: Shintenchi is devoted to delivery a tender and fancy living environment to every customer. We have our own factory, reduce middlemen, can provide you with the most cost-effective products in the same kind of products, to ensure your comfortable life experience. And our indoor sofas are ergonomically designed to fit the curve of the back and relieve the pressure on the back, suitable for a variety of space and style, to meet your needs. You can enjoy a coffee in the morning sun, a tea after lunch and a wine in the night. Our sectional sofa is not large, so it can be a solution for buyers who have small space and need a beautiful sofa! Specifications Color: Dark grey, Light grey, Chocolate, Black, Light Brown,Dark BrownFrame Material: MetalSeat Height:16.9 Inches Tips Instructions before buy 1.Please confirm whether the size of our products meets your requirements before you buy it2.Please note that there is a little color difference between the object and your monitor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE my sofa!!! Exactly as described!!
reviews.reviewText: Watched video provided on Amazon and read assembly instructions provided in box with sofa parts. Delivered cleverly all pieces packed in 2 boxes. Took pieces out of boxes to fit into my 4-door Nissan Altima trunk and back seat. Easy to carry piece-by-piece up stairs and easily fit through my apartment single-size door. Took 5 minutes (at most) to assemble, no tools needed except hex wrench that was provided for 2 screws, all other pieces fit into each other to connect. Left for 24 hours for cushions to fully “inflate” before sitting on it (suggested by a friend). Perfect for small 1-2 use and very firm but not hard seat cushions. Back cushions are thinner and softer and the backrest can be kinda felt, but for me it’s not noticeable or unpleasant (as some reviews I read).Not a sofa for hard-use with children/pets. The cushion material cleans easily, but is not able to be removed for washing.For me it is wry comfortable and big enough (width and length) to lay down comfortably to watch tv or be a second bed for guests which is what I needed!!! The biggest plus for me was that I could get it up stairs piece-by-piece and through my door by myself without expensive $$$ movers. (I’m 5’4” and 58 years old.). Three months later and I couldn’t be more happy with my purchase, the delivery and the product itself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: I know the dimensions were in the photos but the cushions were more narrow than I was expecting, which is completely on me and not the product. Couch was comfortable enough, especially at the price point. Easy to put together. I had just moved into a house and it was perfect just moving and money being tight. I’ve since bought a bigger couch and moved this one to the basement family roomset up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars cheaply made and overpriced, save up for something better
reviews.reviewText: If you just moved to a new place and have been sitting on the floor to watch tv because you can’t afford a good couch, sure this is an option. Yeah it’s one of the cheaper couches out there so I wasn’t expecting much from the start, but for costing over $300 I wasn’t expecting it to be so uncomfortable and unpleasant. The armrests are hard and super uncomfortable. the pillows aren’t very cushy so it’s not nice for your back. The seats are small, you can sit, but forget trying to lay down unless you’re the size of a kid. Overall very cheaply made just by looking at it, wouldn’t be surprised if something breaks in the next few months. Assembly instructions were made by monkeys, no parts were labeled. You’re supposed to just look at the pictures and try to figure out which piece is which. In my opinion, This couch should’ve costed no more than $200. But they add a footstool to a very badly made couch and suddenly you’re paying almost $400. Should’ve saved a couple extra hundred $$ to get one that’s worth the money, but for now it’ll keep us from watching tv on the floor… 2 stars because i’m feeling nice todayUPDATE ONLY 2 MONTHS LATER:One of the armrests broke already after resting my elbow on it a little too hard I guess, couch is still very uncomfortable, the seat cushions don’t fill the entire couch so there is a 2-3 inch gap in between the seat cushions and the edge of the couch which only allows everything to shift around even more. I keep getting scratched by the velcro due to the cushions not staying where they should. Velcro doesn’t really do it’s job of keeping cushions and pillows from moving around so I’m constantly having to fix them. Extremely extremely unhappy with this purchase. I hate it more and more everyday

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Super Comfortable, but Great for Apartments
reviews.reviewText: This is our first couch. We have a small space, and it fits in there wonderfully. It was a decent price, but it is on the firm side, for sure. It has softened up a bit through using it, but it's really not great on the back. Unless you are sitting normally or with your legs out on the ottoman, there is really no comfortable way to sit or lie down without plenty of (added) pillow support. However, I still think it's a good starter couch. I put it together by myself in less than an hour and it's holding up well enough so far. Just make sure you have plenty of fun pillows for back support, and character, of course.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great couch for small people, in small homes
reviews.reviewText: This couch is really great for the price. It was easy for me to assemble alone and is quite comfortable. I'm only 5'2, I live with my little Jack Russel in a very small apartment. It may not suit your needs if you are are larger or have larger people or pets in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, highly uncomfortable!
reviews.reviewText: So I’ve had the couch a few weeks and wanted to really give it time to see if it could be better. It’s a really affordable couch, easy to install, the color is amazing and very accurate to the picture. It arrived in two boxes and the instructions were very clear to getting everything together. The sectional piece is a little shorter compared to others I viewed but not a deal breaker. However, the seat cushions are EXTREMELY firm ( if you like that great), not a comfortable seat at all really and not very inviting to guests, the back cushions are useless, they provide NO support whatsoever and you are sitting with your back against the edge of the back of the couch. Very uncomfortable all around. Great price, terrible quality. I’m not sure if mine is a defect or something because many of the reviews said they loved the couch but I just can’t see how this is okay. I tested a sectional at a furniture store that was about 3-400 more and that is honestly worth the price to get a comfortable and useable couch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent couch for the price
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for just a cheap couch that works, this one is great. It was easy to assemble, and is decently sturdy. We’ve had it for about 8 months. It’s not a couch I’d sleep on, but it works and looks nice enough. All of the cushions come vacuum sealed, so it was great for move-in just not opening it until we got there.

It was little bit of a wait to receive... but it was easily put together ... the cushions that come compressed fluffed up quickly. Nice size for my small apartment and very comfortable. Very happy with it and the price.
I received it there was supposed to be 2 boxes im missing 5 pieces to the couch. I'm so disappointed

J’ai un budget assez serré après ma séparation, donc ce divan m’est revenu très bon prix. Il est sur le côté plutôt ferme et les avants bras sont dur, on peut bien sentir le bois. L’arrière est laid mais caché contre un mur c’est parfait. Les coussins sont emballés sous vide. Ils sont donc très froissé et prennent un moment à reprendre leurs forme initiale. Je les ai repassé au fers vapeur après le 72h d’attente recommandé et ils sont devenus très jolis. Le pouf par contre bouge beaucoup et ne tiens pas en place. J’ai donc mis des autocollants en silicone sous les pattes pour éviter qu’il se déplace. Là couleur tire sur le gris bleuté et le type de tissus amasse beaucoup de poils d’animaux, heureusement c’est également très facile à enlever avec un rouleau collant. Il faut donc garder en perspective que ce divan n’as pas couté très cher et que pour le prix déboursé, il ne faut pas s’attendre à un summum de qualité. Mais je suis très satisfaite il répond à tout mes besoins et je le recommande chaudement à tout ceux et celle qui cherchent un divan tout en ayant un budget restreint. Pour le prix les petits défauts qui y sont associés sont minimes. J’aime beaucoup mon achat!
The sectional edge is looking very rough and it does not look 100% like the picture captured here.
